Looking for Christmas inspiration? Check out our Christmas 2016 suggestions.

What better gift than a book, album or film for Christmas? Whoever the gift is for, we've got loads of ideas for you, as well as lots of free digital magazines full of craft, present and cooking ideas.

Privacy & cookies

By using our site you agree to our use of cookies. Find out what cookies we use, how they affect you and how you can control them: our cookie policy.

Suffolk Libraries HMRC charity number is XT34476 and our registered company number is IP031542.
